## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I came across the Verus Coin Foundation and I'm not quite sure what it's about. Can you tell me more about it?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus Coin Foundation is a foundation that receives proceeds from the sale of physical coins on VerusGear.com. The coins sold are attached to VerusIDs and offer additional benefits, such as access to a special Gold DAO for gold coin owners.

**User:**
That's interesting. I was thinking of supporting the foundation by buying some merchandise. What kind of merchandise is available for purchase to support the Verus Coin Foundation?

**AI Assistant:**
You can find a variety of merchandise on VerusGear.com, including Verus t-shirts, sweaters, stickers, mousepads, hats, flags, and face masks. A significant portion of the profit (at least 20%) from these sales goes to the Verus Coin Foundation, so you'll be supporting a great cause while showing off your Verus spirit!
What is the Verus Coin Foundation, and how is it related to the coin sale on VerusGear.com?

The Verus Coin Foundation is a foundation that receives proceeds from the sale of physical coins on VerusGear.com. The coins sold are attached to VerusIDs and offer additional benefits, such as access to a special Gold DAO for gold coin owners.

$175,000 USD Coin Sale VerusGear.com!
VerusGear.com did an exclusive gold, silver and bronze physical coin sale. In this first successful round over $175,000 USD worth of physical coins were sold. All proceeds go to the Verus Coin Foundation. The coins are the first of their kind physical objects attached to VerusIDs. On top of that, the owners of gold coins are connected to a special Gold DAO. Right now you can not buy any physical coins anymore. There will be more sales in the future so keep an eye out!
Get your Verus t-shirts, sweaters, stickers, mousepad, hat, flag and face mask now! 20% or more of the profit is donated to the Verus Coin Foundation.

For Miners: SRBminer and Nanominer Problems
Since the VerusID Marketplace and Verus Vault mainnet upgrade there have been problems for miners using SRBminer and Nanominer. Please use alternatives such as CCminer, hellminer and nheqminer for now [download here].
